'''Long Yumemiru Table''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Long Yumemiru Table is obtainable from reaching [[Reputation]] Level 6 in [[Inazuma]].

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 14h
|Yumemiru Wood = 8
|Iron Chunk = 2
|Red Dye = 2
